text:
Here Is Your Enormous 2017 Detroit Auto Show Photo Gallery jalopnik   Video Jalopnik Reviews Foxtrot Alpha Black Flag Truck Yeah Lanesplitter The Garage 
Here Is Your Enormous 2017 Detroit Auto Show Photo Gallery Kurt Bradley 55 minutes ago Filed to: Detroit Auto Show Images 62 9   Toggle Conversation tools Go to permalink You may also like Truck Yeah Alleged Ford Designer Drops Juicy Details On New Bronco And Ranger On Reddit Jalopnik Here's What The Only Chinese Cars At The Detroit Auto Show Are Actually Like Jalopnik Putting The 'America' Back Into The North American International Auto Show Truck Yeah The Mercedes-Maybach SUV Is Real And It's Going To Be Gigantic Advertisement 
Okay, so the 2017 Detroit Auto Show was kind of an endless parade of Toyota Camrys, boring crossovers and empty corporate patriotism . I didnâ€™t care. I take the pictures and I managed to find some great stuff anyway. Take a look at a metric shit-ton of shots I took Monday and Tuesday.
